item.title: Travis Kelce Just Teamed Up With Activist Investors for a $200 Million Bet on Six Flags
item.description: Jana Partners and the NFL star now control nearly 9% of the company—aiming to revive a fading amusement park empire.

item.title: Melania Trump Memecoin Sparks Lawsuit Over Alleged Scam
item.description: At one point, the Melania Trump memecoin had a market cap of more than $2 billion. Now its founders are the target of a fraud lawsuit.

item.title: A Beloved Vibe Coding Platform Is Finally Getting Upgraded for More Casual Users
item.description: With updates from Anthropic and Google, the options for entrepreneurs interested in getting into vibe coding keep getting better.

item.title: GM Is Bringing Google’s Gemini AI to Vehicles in 2026
item.description: The automaker announced a series of updates, including one that will one day let drivers take their eyes off the road.

item.title: Great Leaders Share the Fires They’re Fighting
item.description: Being transparent about mistakes and challenges builds trust and keeps culture intact.
